name: Alpha Agency v0.04 (Test)
description:
Test build for Alpha Agency v0.04 Patrons only.

This includes a starting screen, a fully built out level design of our tutorial area, with civilian and enemy AI, as well as a teleport to our next level build.

Currently still in the blockout phase of our project.

CONTROLS:

WASD - move around

Mouse - to aim, Left Click - shoot, Right Click - Aim down sights

Middle Mouse Button - Cover system

E - pickup guns (hint: they are outside the cafe starting building)

Shift - Run

Space - Jump
